servinfo.title: Noise
servinfo.ptxt: Diagnose transfer assembly after performing the following inspections.

s1.ptxt: Perform 4WD control system check referring to 4WD Control System Check:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) .
Confirm 4WD control system operation referring to 4WD Control System Operation:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator)

action.ptxt: Refer to Transfer Assembly Inspection:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) .
Refer to Transfer Assembly Inspection:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) .

ps.ptxt: Damaged or worn chamfered tooth on sleeve or gear

action.ptxt: Refer to Transfer Assembly Inspection:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) .
